npmPackage.name: gatsby-theme-tasting-notes
npmPackage.description: This is a very basic fork of the Gatsby Theme Jam theme. It's made to gather persona tasting notes about spirits. Updates will follow in the next months.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Gatsby Theme Tasting Notes

This is a very basic fork of the Gatsby Theme Jam theme. Itâ€™s made to gather persona tasting notes about spirits. Updates will follow in the next months.

See the live demo

Installation

To use this theme in your Gatsby sites, follow these instructions:

  1. Install the theme

    npm install --save gatsby-theme-tasting-notes

  2. Add the theme to your gatsby-config.js:

    module.exports = {
  plugins: ["gatsby-theme-tasting-notes"],
}

  3. Start your site

    gatsby develop
